fields.label: Banner Height
fields.name: banner_height
fields.instructions: Do not add px, %, em etc. only enter numaric value. Default header height would be 300px.

fields.label: Show in Full width
fields.name: banner_in_box_container
fields.instructions: If you Enable this then the banner will be displayed in 100% width otherwise it will display within the container size.

fields.label: Banner Layout
fields.name: banner_layout
fields.instructions: If you will select light layout then image shown in clear format, if you select dark then there will be an opacity layer will shown above the image.

fields.label: Logo Width
fields.name: admin_logo_width
fields.instructions: Size would consider in px, but not include PX. Write only the size.

fields.label: Logo Height
fields.name: admin_logo_height
fields.instructions: Size would consider in px, but not include PX. Write only the size.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: admin_background_color
fields.instructions: Color Should be in Hex color Formate i.e. #ffffff.

fields.label: Label Color
fields.name: admin_label_color
fields.instructions: Color Should be in Hex color Formate i.e. #ffffff.

fields.label: Login Button Color
fields.name: admin_login_button_color
fields.instructions: Color Should be in Hex color Formate i.e. #ffffff.

fields.label: Under Maintenance Text
fields.name: um_under_maintenance_text
fields.default_value:
Website is Under Maintenance

Sorry, we are making some changes on our site. Check back soon! We are currently Creating Something Awesome.

fields.label: Google Analytics Code (Script append in Head section)
fields.name: google_analytics_code
fields.instructions: Put complete Script including "script" tag.

fields.label: Script GTM  (Script append in Body section)
fields.name: body_analytics_code_gtm
fields.instructions: Put complete Script including "script" tag.

fields.label: Site Loading Image
fields.name: site_loading_image
fields.instructions:
Recommended image size should be 100px X 100px.
Please upload the optimized image, should be in KBs.

fields.label: Sticky Logo
fields.name: sticky_logo
fields.instructions: This is Optional. If you don't add the logo it is by default takes the main logo.

fields.label: Social
fields.name: social
fields.instructions: To show Social Enable it. Or to hide select Disable

fields.label: Bradcrumb
fields.name: show_bradcrumb
fields.instructions: Make Enable to show Bradcrumb on all pages. Make Disable to hide Bradecrumb on all pages.

fields.label: Full width
fields.name: single_banner_in_box_container
fields.instructions: If you Enable this then the banner will be displayed in 100% width otherwise it will display within the container size.

fields.label: Registration
fields.name: rev_registration
fields.instructions: Select Page that you want to use for Registration Process

fields.label: Verification
fields.name: rev_verification
fields.instructions: Select Page that you want to use for User Verification Process

fields.label: Login
fields.name: rev_login
fields.instructions: Select Page that you want to use for Login Process

fields.label: After Login
fields.name: rev_after_login
fields.instructions: Select Page that you want to use for Thankyou/My account Process

fields.label: Forgot password
fields.name: rev_forgot_password
fields.instructions: Select Page that you want to use for Forgot Password Process

fields.label: Reset Password
fields.name: rev_reset_password
fields.instructions: Select Page that you want to use for Reset Password Process
